column4: How can I diagnose this? On htop I get like 12% memory usage overall(on files clickable) and it shows 100% at top
Hello... Can anyone point me towards a virus software that's free and downloadable?
and that I can scan for viruses on my own with
I have a very very bad trojan that will not allow my graphics to work and I need a fix very fast.
all I know is when I'm trying to watch a youtube video it says usable ram can't find 17 bytes
and on htop it shows my ram capped and the files I can see only use up 20% max
I can guarentee you it's a trojan because I watched me get it yesterday
I was browsing 4chan and clicked a link that people later explained as a trojan and ever since my ram's been capped
well that doesn't really help me now that I can't watch videos...
how do I diagnose a virus on Ubuntu?
easiest way, download avast from avast.com (register it), then scan your windows partition w/ it...
whatever your issue is, it's unlikely a virus that was caused by you clicking a link9(under ubuntu)
PM it to me
i work in a max security prison, nothing you show me is probably not something i've not saw a gazillion times
thats an error, not a link
gimme the link
so what is your issue, you're just dying to see it or what
when i remove the actual video link, and go tot he homepage, and click a video, none of the videos work
correct, it doesn't mean you have a virus
there's a million sites, for virtually any fettish, if thats the best you can find... you probably need to work on yoru google-foo
your monitor cable will have an audio jack.. plug it into the the speaker port
